verses.verse: Simon <S%G4826><s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%>, a <S%G1401>servant<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G652>apostle<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, to them that have <S%G2975>obtained<s%> a like <S%G2472>precious<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> with <S%G2254>us<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4990>Saviour<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>:

Grace <S%G5485><s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%> be <S%G4129>multiplied<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G1922>knowledge<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%>;

Yea <S%G5209><s%>, I will give <S%G4704>diligence<s%> <S%G4704>that<s%> at every <S%G1539>time<s%> <S%G5209>ye<s%> may be <S%G4160>able<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G1699>my<s%> <S%G1841>decease<s%> to call these <S%G5130>things<s%> to <S%G3420>remembrance<s%>.

and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> we ourselves <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G5342>borne<s%> <S%G1537>out<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%>, when <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G5607>were<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3735>the<s%> <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G3735>mount<s%>.
